title: Asthma Adults
content:
* Itâ€™s important to get the flu jab every year because each year the flu vaccine is developed to match the different strains of flu virus you are likely to come across. 
  * Have your COVID-19 booster vaccination if you can.
  * Some people are eligible for the [respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) vaccine](https://healthify.nz/medicines-a-z/a/arexvy-vaccine).
  * Read more about[influenza](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/i/influenza "Influenza")[flu vaccine](https://healthify.nz/medicines-a-z/i/influenza-vaccine-adults "Influenza vaccine") and the [COVID-19 vaccine](https://healthify.nz/medicines-a-z/c/covid-19-vaccination-topics). 


####  When should I go back to my healthcare provider? 
  * Keep an eye on your symptoms.
